title: Ep. 12 - A Tale of Two Daddies
itunes:title: Ep. 12 - A Tale of Two Daddies
itunes:subtitle: Trapped in a witch's cottage, the dads face their greatest challenge yet. Glenn does some detective work, Henry reveals latent prejudices, Darryl finally unlocks an achievement, and Ron calls in the help of a friend.
description:
Trapped in a witch's cottage, the dads face their greatest challenge yet. Glenn does some detective work, Henry reveals latent prejudices, Darryl finally unlocks an achievement, and Ron calls in the help of a friend.


This episode contains profanity, violence, and sexual content.
